arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	--local S_CHANNEL_ANIM = Hydra.ReferencePower("LE_AnimChannelPower")
	
	--Hydra.QActorMoveToLocation(idLorath, S_Moveto_Holdout, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_RUN, true)
	
	--Lorath moves to close the hell rift
	--Play the conversation while running to position, then channel once at position
	--TODO: fix lorath channel animation
	--Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_05, idActor, idLorath)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
		Hydra.QActorEnableAI(idLorath, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idLorath)
		Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_05, idLorath)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idLorath, S_Moveto_Holdout, "NPC_Run", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idLorath, ID_LORATH_STATIC_02)
		Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idLorath, S_CONV_LORATH_05)
		Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idLorath)
	end
	
	Hydra.EventSend("QST_Step_CultistCanyon_HellRift")
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	idLorathFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	idPlayer = Hydra.ActorGetFollowTarget(idLorathFollower)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorathFollower) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_06B, idPlayer, idLorathFollower)
	end
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	--Remove Lorath (follower) and enable static lorath
	Hydra.ActorDelete(idLorath)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	--Set Player Variable to mark that player has spoken to Lorath about Orbei
	Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idActorPlayer, "QST_Step_KedBardu_OrbeiTalk")
end

function Start(idActor, snoQuest)	

	for i, idCorpse in pairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup("Step_Saga_CultistCanyon_Adds")) do
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idCorpse)
	end
	Hydra.MusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent", "Music_DrySteppes_Watchtower_Complete")
	--Move Lorath to Lilith Statue
	idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
		Hydra.QActorEnableAI(idLorath, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idLorath)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationConstantSpeed(idLorath, ID_LORATH_STATIC_04, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_WALK, true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idLorath, ID_LORATH_STATIC_04)
		Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idLorath)
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idLorath)
	end
	
	--Enable Static Lorath at Lilith Statue
	Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_LORATH_STATIC_04)
	
end

function Start(idActor, snoQuest)
	-- Hell rift cleanup
	Hydra.EventSend("CultistCanyon_RiftEventCleanup")

	-- Static Lorath cleanup
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02, idLorathMagic)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	--Retart Rift Encounter if Reset
	if Hydra.QuestIsActive("QST_Step_AbarhuRift_RiftEnc")	then
		Hydra.EventSend("QST_Step_AbarhuRift_RiftEnc_Start")
	end
	
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
--Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02, "AnimKey_Chant_Ritual_Sky")
Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02, S_LORATH_HELLRIFT_ANIMSET)
idLorathMagic = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02, S_LORATH_MAGIC_EFFECTGROUP, true)

--Start Rift Holdout Encounter
Hydra.EventSend("QST_Step_AbarhuRift_RiftEnc_Start")

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_21a, ID_LORATH_STATIC_04)
	Hydra.ClearMusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent")
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_21b, ID_LORATH_STATIC_04)
	Hydra.ClearMusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent")
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idLorath, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idLorath)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationConstantSpeed(idLorath, LOC_LORATH_GENBAR, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_RUN, false)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idLorath, LOC_LORATH_GENBAR)
		Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idLorath)
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idLorath)
	end
	
	Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_LORATH_STATIC_03)

end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	--Genbar is heard chanting to Lilith
	local tPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
	for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		Hydra.ActorPlayDisembodiedConversation(S_CONV_GENBAR_CHANT, idPlayer)
	end	

end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_10, idLorath)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_LORATH_STATIC_03)
	Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_GENBAR)
	Hydra.MusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent", "Music_DrySteppes_Watchtower_Boss")
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	followerLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
	-- Lorath bark when megademon spawns
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerLorath) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_20, followerLorath)
	end
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	followerLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
	-- Lorath bark when megademon spawns
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerLorath) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_11, followerLorath)
	end
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	-- From the holdout completion
	Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_HANDLE_DOOR)
	
	for id, i in ipairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup("Step_Saga_CultistCanyon_holdout_Portals_All")) do
		Hydra.Wait(0.25)
		Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(i, 2.0)
	end
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(GENBAR_JOURNAL, false)
	
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LORATH_SEARCH_MARKER_01, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LORATH_SEARCH_MARKER_01)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)
	
	Hydra.EventSend("Cultist Canyon Lorath Search01 Reached")

end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
Hydra.Wait(1.0)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)
	-- move Lorath to broken statue
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LORATH_SEARCH_MARKER_02, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LORATH_SEARCH_MARKER_02)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, S_LORATH_SEARCH_ANIMSET)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)

	Hydra.EventSend("Cultist Canyon Lorath Search02 Reached")
	Hydra.EventSend("Cultist Canyon Genbar House Searched")

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)

-- Move Lorath to murder room
Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)
Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LORATH_SEARCH_MARKER_03, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_09, ID_LORATH_HOUSE)
Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, S_CONV_LORATH_09)
Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LOC_LORATH_HOUSE, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(ID_LORATH_HOUSE, LOC_LORATH_HOUSE)
Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)

	
Hydra.EventSend("Cultist Canyon Genbar House Searched")

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_LORATH_HOUSE)

-- Lorath comments on Genbar's house
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(ID_LORATH_HOUSE) then
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_19, ID_LORATH_HOUSE)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idLorath, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idLorath)
		Hydra.ActorSetSheathPreference(idLorath, (Hydra.SHEATH_PREF_SHEATHED))
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationConstantSpeed(idLorath, LOC_LORATH_HOUSE_ENT, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_RUN, false)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idLorath, LOC_LORATH_HOUSE_ENT)
		Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idLorath)
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idLorath)
	end
	
--Disable Static Holdout Lorath
Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_LORATH_STATIC_02)

end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
--Lorath coments on Hell Rift
idLorath = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Lorath_Follower")
	
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLorath) then
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_LORATH_13, idLorath)
end
